title: WhatsApp-Based Online Project Learning in Psychology

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Experimental implementation for post-COVID-19 non-face-to-face education reinforcement. Focuses on real-time interaction and project collaboration using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners achieve participation in discussions on psychological topics with peers and instructors at least twice a week via WhatsApp group chats.
Learners complete three psychology case analysis projects structured in PBL (Problem-Based Learning) format and present them as multimedia submissions.
Learners achieve an 80% or higher participation rate in peer evaluation and feedback processes using online interactive tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
